Text:
Hi jumpingphil
Here Is Something For You

This is excellent, thank you very much.
I have the video on VHS but I would obviously prefer to have it on DVD.
I do have a download of it all going but it has been stuck at 98.5% for days now.

In my opinion Roger once was the center of Pink Floyd, but lost nearly all his genious when leaving the group - but the rest of Pink Floyd were also not able to climb to the highest musicas spheres. It's a pity ... so sad.
